description:
This is all about letting go and letting the watercolor paint itself with minimal planning. Challenge yourself and join me in learning how to paint this exciting atmospheric watercolor. 

Work at your own Pace with unlimited access at anytime. Once you purchase this course you have life-time access.

  • For anyone who wants to learn to paint wet in wet
  • Some watercolor experience is helpful
  • Learn to paint a dramatic stormy sky in just six easy lessons
  • Discover how to loosen up your style for a more exciting result

Take the plunge and let your brushes do the work.
title: Painting A Dramatic Stormy Sky in Watercolor
